de.mizi.magicsearch.output
Class MagicCardPagerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter
          de.mizi.magicsearch.output.MagicCardPagerAdapter

public class MagicCardPagerAdapter
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter

This class creates each fragment with the cardinfo that is shown in the detail view of a magiccard.

Constructor Detail

MagicCardPagerAdapter

public MagicCardPagerAdapter(android.support.v4.app.FragmentManager manager,
                             java.util.List<MagicCardData> data)
Creates the adapter with the given carddata that shall be shown. There will be a fragment created for each single magiccard.

Parameters:
manager - needed for backward support
data - all cards that shall be shown
